nodes.text: Cally Pon was a soldier who served in the Rebel Alliance's army, stationed at Echo Base on the planet Hoth. During the Galactic Empire's invasion of Hoth in 3 ABY, Pon used an A280 blaster rifle that constantly overheated. The soldier later called out the approach of enemy Imperial snowtroopers, which proceeded to engage the rebel defenders. The rebel ground forces eventually abandoned their positions and numerous personnel of Echo Base evacuated aboard starship transports.
Cally Pon appeared in the short story "Beyond Hope," written by Michael Moreci as a part of the 2020 short story collection From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back.
